__e: Although, it's not just food that they're after.
I may be lacking, but I'm still your older brother.
Although I am not better than you, I am your older brother, and I am a man with pride.
She is happy even though she doesn't know what love is.
I'm told you can't break out of this. Although, I can't imagine how anybody could.
And, of course, she is the person I write for every day. Although, I don't think she ever reads it.
Even if she is my mother, She isn't.
Although someone who doesn't have much time to live.
"I've had a serious accident." "But I'm not in danger at the moment," "although it's a matter of life or death."
While the timing of the evidence is suspect, we're talking about a man's life.
Although time has passed, you should know, there is a reason as to why I let you go that day.
And I love my new job. Even though my boss just died.
Even though I've made loads of mistakes, she's always there.
I am well in there with those two although I'm a bit worried they only like me because they think I'm white.
Although I always think it would be great to work together, just not like this.
Even though Grandmother has made the decision, I'm still her grandson.
Although people do send me their stuff, I just am not in a place to want to listen to that kind of stuff anymore.
And although I was his eldest son, I was not sure I was going to succeed.
If I hadn't a called you,you wouldn't have come here, even though I asked younot to come here.
Hey, it doesn't really matter if I think you can do the job, although I do.
